title: abbs_03
author: abbs_03
content: ICBIT was the first bitcoin futures derivative market, which was acquired by Safello, a Swedish crypto exchange. Is there any possible way to get the historical dataset of the various instruments which was traded in ICBIT, which is needed for my research purposes.

comments.author: logfiles
comments.body: Have you tried contacting the current Safello exchange? They probably have the data. There are not so many if at all any sites that accurate Bitcoin prices from back in the day especially derivative products prices

comments.author: abbs_03
comments.body: Yes, I have. they have not been responsive. I am searching for alternate sources on the internet but have not found any yet.
